Package ca.dominicmayhew.Pipe

package ca.dominicmayhew.Pipe
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Pipe<T>
    A shared memory pipeline whose interface is the `put()` and `get()` methods.
    PipeTest
    Runs a test on a producer/consumer style shared memory pipeline and logs results.
    Record
    The object used by Workers to simulate use of a producer/consumer pipeline.
    Worker<T>
    Abstract Superclass for `Creator` and `Receiver`.
